hyperlink support:

I can consistently reproduce this problem if I switch back and forth between a 
Java stack frame and an Ant stack frame. (same stack trace as in the initial 
problem)

Created an attachment (id=16660)
fix

The fix uses the new ISourceViewerExtension2 interface to "unconfigure" the
source viewer before reconfiguring it.
